basic_information.scholarship_name: Gladys Dronberger Endowed School Counseling Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Gladys Dronberger Endowed School Counseling

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing a graduate degree in School Counseling. Eligibility Requirements This scholarship is open to any student who is pursuing their graduate degree in School Counseling Must have a 3.0 GPA or higher Must have completed at least (9) semester hours in a graduate school counseling program at UCO Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
